22:1    201

22:3, 4    353
22:12    59
22:17    13, 72, 100, 150, 151, 199, 202
22:18, 19    310
From infancy you have known the holy writings which are able to make you wise for salvation through the faith in connection with Christ Jesus. All Scripture is inspired of God and beneficial for teaching, for reproving, for setting things straight, for disciplining in righteousness, that the man of God may be fully competent, completely equipped for every good work.—2 Tim. 3:15-17, NW.
